text: Is anyone familiar with packaging OpenCV in Julia? It looks like there are bindings within OpenCV documented here: <https://docs.opencv.org/master/d8/da4/tutorial_julia.html> and there is an out of date (pre 1.0) package here: <https://juliaopencv.github.io/latest/>. I haven't confirmed that the OpenCV instructions actually work on 1.5 yet, just asking around if anyone else has looked at this

text: Aha, I found <https://github.com/JuliaPackaging/Yggdrasil/pull/1497>. Looks a little stalled. I'll go with building CMake from source now.
